type1_missing.reasoning: Middleware configuration file completely missing - no middleware.ts exists to protect /dashboard routes or redirect authenticated users from login/register pages
POST /api/auth/logout endpoint missing - logout directory exists but contains no route.ts file
Email validation function with regex pattern /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/ not implemented - no validateEmail function exists in validation.ts
Empty state message 'No tasks yet. Add your first task above!' not displayed in TaskList component when tasks array is empty
Client-side email format validation with specified regex not implemented on login and register pages - only uses browser's default type='email' validation

type2_incorrect.reasoning: Session cookie name is 'session' instead of specified 'todo-session'
Error response format returns { error: 'message' } instead of specified format { error: { code: 'ERROR_CODE', message: 'Human-readable message' } }
Dashboard displays mock user data (hardcoded 'User' and 'user@example.com') instead of fetching actual user information from the API
Bulk operations clearCompletedTasks, deleteAllTasks, and toggleAllTasks are not wrapped in db.transaction() for atomic operations as specified
Statistics bar lacks responsive design implementation - does not stack vertically on mobile breakpoints (375px), only uses horizontal flex layout
